presentationColumns.name: # of Lead Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Activities associated to Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Lead Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Open Lead Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Open Activities associated to Leads (Activity Status not equal to Complete/Cancelled)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Open Lead Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Completed Lead Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Completed Activities associated to Leads (Activity Status = Complete)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Completed Lead Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Expired Lead Activities
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Activities associated to Leads (Activity Status not equal to Complete/Cancelled and Current Date greater than Activity Due Date)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Expired Lead Activities

presentationColumns.name: # of Lead Appointments
presentationColumns.description: The total Appointments associated to Leads (Activity function = Appointments)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Lead Appointments

presentationColumns.name: # of Lead Call Reports
presentationColumns.description: The total Call Reports associated to Leads (Activity function = Call Reports)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Lead Call Reports

presentationColumns.name: # of Lead Tasks
presentationColumns.description: The total Tasks associated to Leads (Activity function = Task)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Lead Tasks

presentationColumns.name: # of Lead Activities for Highly Ranked Leads
presentationColumns.description: The total Activities for highly ranked Leads (Lead Rank = Hot)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.# of Lead Activities for Highly Ranked Leads

localization.localizationKey: # of Lead Activities for Highly Ranked Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Converted Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Converted Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Activities for Converted Leads/# of Converted Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Converted Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Qualified Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Qualified Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Activities for Qualified Leads/# of Qualified Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Qualified Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Rejected Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Rejected Leads. This metric is computed as follows:100 * # of Activities for Rejected Leads/# of Rejected Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Rejected Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Retired Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Retired Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Activities for Retired Leads/# of Retired Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Retired Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Unaccepted Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Unaccepted Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Activities for Unaccepted Leads/# of Unaccepted Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Unaccepted Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Unassigned Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Unassigned Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Activities for Unassigned Leads/# of Unassigned Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Unassigned Leads

presentationColumns.name: Activity Rate - Unconverted Leads
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Unconverted Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Activities for Unconverted Leads/# of Unconverted Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Activity Rate - Unconverted Leads

presentationColumns.name: Average Activity Duration For Completed Activities
presentationColumns.description: The average time taken to complete an activity. This metric is computed as follows: Activity duration for completed activity/# of Completed Activities
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Average Activity Duration For Completed Activities

localization.localizationKey: Average Activity Duration For Completed Activities

presentationColumns.name: Lead First Response Time
presentationColumns.description: The time to respond to an assigned Lead. This metric is computed as follows: Date of first Lead Activity - Lead assigned date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Lead First Response Time

presentationColumns.name: Average Number of Lead Activities Per Team Member
presentationColumns.description: The average number of Lead Activities per Team member.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Average Number of Lead Activities Per Team Member

localization.localizationKey: Average Number of Lead Activities Per Team Member

presentationColumns.name: Lead Activity Rate
presentationColumns.description: The rate of Activities for Leads. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Lead Activities/# of Leads
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Lead Activity Rate

presentationColumns.name: Lead Idle Days
presentationColumns.description: The days since the last Lead Activity. This metric is computed as follows: Current Date - Last Lead Activity Date
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Lead Activity.Lead Idle Days
